casebody.data:
HOBART MANUFACTURING COMPANY, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. LANDERS, FRARY & CLARK, Defendant-Appellee. No. 108. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Nov. 20, 1939. Greer Marechal, of Dayton, Ohio, (John B. Hayward, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. T. Clay Lindsey and George N. Robillard, both of Hartford, Conn., for appellee.

Before SWAN, CHASE, and CLARK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree, 26 F.Supp. 198, affirmed on opinion below.
